column4: I think you can add whatever keybinding you want to your screenrc
Thanks I just figured it out that I set the keybindings to none in the .screen-prfiles/keybindings file.
cool.  How did you set that bindkey up? (out of curiosity)
I was messing around with the menu and noticed there was a section to disable all bind keys which is what I wanted. I am not use to screen having bind keys besides the standard ^ ones.
